name: Bitgain
description: In the world of Blockchain transactions, users often deal with complex cryptographic addressesâ€”strings of characters that are hard to recognise and even harder to remember. BitGain steps in as a friendly solution, focusing on identity verification and secure crypto transactions. Say goodbye to the struggle and fear of dealing with long, convoluted addresses. Just like how web users replace confusing IP addresses with user-friendly domain names through DNS, BitGain lets Blockchain users replace their lengthy crypto addresses with easy-to-recall names. Imagine not needing to copy and paste addresses from one place to another anymore. Getting a name through BitGain is a breeze, giving everyone the perks of convenience and boosted security when interacting with decentralised apps (DApps) and other users.
